pullrequest.title: Add random walk support to GaussianNoise

content.raw:
My apologies for such a long time in reviewing this. I agree that considering position correlation will probably require a bit more thought.

I need to think a little more about the distinction between absolute time and delta time. One tricky situation there is what to do when the simulation time is reset.
content.html:
My apologies for such a long time in reviewing this. I agree that considering position correlation will probably require a bit more thought.

I need to think a little more about the distinction between absolute time and delta time. One tricky situation there is what to do when the simulation time is reset.
